alert.note: Alert for De Witt; Macon; Moultrie; Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 10:22PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Moultrie, southern Piatt, south central De Witt and northeastern Macon Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1021 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oreana, or 7 miles northeast of Decatur, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Argenta around 1025 PM CDT. Cerro Gordo around 1035 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bement and Hammond. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 139 and 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
